alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Mobile (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 11 at 6:16PM CDT until July 11 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL MOBILE AND WEST CENTRAL BALDWIN COUNTIES... At 615 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Saraland to 4 miles east of Chickasaw to 4 miles west of Stapleton, moving southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Midtown Mobile, Downtown Mobile, Prichard, Tillmans Corner, Saraland, Chickasaw, Satsuma, Spanish Fort, Creola, I65 And I165, Mobile Regional Airport, I65 And AL 158 and I10 And I65. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
